titleStmt.title: The Humble petition of divers, barronets, knights, esquires, gentlemen, ministers, freeholders and others of the county of Derbie to the number of seven thousand seventy and seven presented to the honourable, the knights, citizens and burgesses of the House of Commons by Gods goodnesse assembled and his gracious good providence hitherto preserved in Parliament / as it was presented by Sir John Curzon... March 14, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Curzon, John, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
